Series-SYNOPSIS/PLOT:

⚔️ “The Winter King” – A MGM+ Original Ten-Episodic British Historical Fiction Fantasy Drama Series – A former warrior, now turned monk, tells the story of how Arthur became the lord of war despite the illegitimacy of his throne.

📝 PLOT :- The Series Is Based On Bernard Cornwell’s “The Warlord Chronicles” Series Of Novels. The Story Is A Retelling Of The Arthurian Legend And Takes Place In Post-Roman Dark Age Britain, And Centres Around The Valiant ‘Arthur Pendragon’, The Bastard Son Of Ruthless King ‘Uther’, Who Has Been Exiled. As An Outcast, ‘Arthur’ Grows Into A Formidable Warrior And Respected Leader, Trying To Find His Place In The World !!

💫 Starring : Iain De Caestecker, Daniel Ings, Jordan Alexandra, Stuart Campbell & Ken Nwosu

🎬 Directed By : Otto Bathurst ( “Peaky Blinders”)

💲 Produced By : Sony Pictures Television’s Production Company Bad Wolf Ltd (“A Discovery Of Witches”, His Dark Materials”, “The Night Of”)
